title: Sirius Hires Top Builder of Disney+ Streaming Service
sub_head: Satellite radio company bets on one of streaming tech’s key designers to help attract listeners beyond the car
body:
Satellite radio broadcaster SiriusXM has tapped a top architect of the Disney + streaming service to help it broaden its appeal to audiences outside the car.
Joe Inzerillo, who as executive vice president and chief technology officer of Walt Disney Co. ’s streaming unit played a key role in the creation and launch of the Disney + platform, is joining Sirius XM Holdings Inc. next month as chief product and technology officer, the company said.
